original_text: Samuel had died before this. All the Israelites had been very sad at his death. They had buried him in Ramah, the town where he had lived. When Samuel had been alive, Saul had removed magicians from Israel. Saul removed everyone who used magic to speak to the spirits of dead people.
korean_text: 사무엘이 죽었으므로 온 이스라엘이 그를 두고 슬피 울며 그의 고향 라마에 장사하였고 사울은 신접한 자와 박수를 그 땅에서 쫓아내었더라

sentences.original_text: All the Israelites had been very sad
They had buried him in Ramah
the town where he had lived
Saul had removed magicians from Israel
Saul removed everyone who used magic
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 마법을 사용하는 모든 사람을 추방했다

sentences.original_text: to speak to the spirits of dead people
